knimeNode.name: Geocoding
knimeNode.shortDescription: Provides latitude and longitude for given addresses.

fullDescription.intro: This node provides latitude and longitude for given addresses by using the MapQuest Open Geocoding API or an installation of the Gisgraphy Geocoder. The services from MapQuest and "Bundesamt f체r Kartographie und Geod채sie" require a key/UUID, which have to be entered in the KNIME preferences under KNIME->Geocoding. The MapQuest key can be obtained from http://developer.mapquest.com/web/info/account/app-keys. Please contact the "Bundesamt f체r Kartographie und Geod채sie" to get the UUID for its service "gdz_geokodierung".

tab.name: Common
tab.option: The address that should be geocoded.
Some services enforce a request rate for the Geocoding. To satisfy this rate, the user can specify the delay between two request.
In some cases multiple results are returned for a single address. Several options are provided on how to perform in this case.
